td.content: s:a female longshoreman aged 66 Ys presents w/ c/o 5 weeks h/o moderate difficulty walking, moderate difficulty climbing stairs, moderate thigh pain and Heart. she is a heavy drinker she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 164 cm, Weight 71.8 kg, Temperature 37.4 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 177, DiastolicBP 108, Respiration 16, Heart = 3/6 systolic murmur over the right second intercostal space, S1 and S2 present, Skin = shiny appearance, dry, erythematous skin at lower extremities, Chest = clear to auscultation B/L, no rales or wheezing, Extremities = absent dorsalis pulsation's B/L a:Hypertension p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.

td.content: s:pt presents with 3 weeks history of moderate thigh pain, moderate difficulty climbing stairs, moderate difficulty walking and Heart. pt is a white F longshoreman aged 66 ys. she is a chronic alcoholic she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 163 cm, Weight 70.6 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 172, DiastolicBP 106, Respiration 15, Heart = 3/6 systolic murmur over the right second intercostal space, S1 and S2 present, Skin = shiny appearance, dry, erythematous skin at lower extremities, Chest = clear to auscultation B/L, no rales or wheezing, Extremities = absent dorsalis pulsation's B/L a:Hypertension p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered 2D echocardiogram panel, ECG.

td.content: s:pt presents with 2 years history of moderate difficulty climbing stairs, moderate thigh pain, moderate difficulty walking and Heart. she is a white f aged 66 years. she denies smoking consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily o:Height 164 cm, Weight 72.2 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 178, DiastolicBP 109, Respiration 18, 2D echocardiogram panel shows left Ventricular Hypertrophy, ECG LVH, Heart = 3/6 systolic murmur over the right second intercostal space, S1 and S2 present, Skin = shiny appearance, dry, erythematous skin at lower extremities, Chest = clear to auscultation B/L, no rales or wheezing, Extremities = absent dorsalis pulsation's B/L a:Hypertension p:administered metoprolol - 50 mg daily, performed 2D echocardiogram panel, ECG, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
